# Использованные Аннотации

1. [Lombok]()
   * [@NoArgsConstructor]()
   * [@AllArgsConstructor]()
   * [@Data]()
   * [@Value]()
   * [@Slf4j]()
2. [Spring]() 
   * [@Configuration]()
   * [@Component]()
   * [@Service]()
   * [@KafkaListener(topics = orderTopic)]()
3. [Hibernate]()
   * [@Autowired]()
   * [@Entity]()
   * [@Id]()
   * [@GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)]()
